#### Checklist

> Note: Developer is responsible for checking your own code according to this checklist.

##### Requirement:

- [ ] Functionality works correctly as per the requirement
- [ ] All new features and changes have adequate test coverage (unit/integration/e2e)
- [ ] API endpoints follow RESTful conventions and return appropriate status codes
- [ ] Database migrations are included and properly tested
